title: Revert Reksai ultimate please
body: There's a reason nobody plays the champion anymore. Because you gutted her, the ulitmate makes no sense Reksai isn't supposed to be an Assassian. Just admit that the rework was a complete failure.

replies.body:
Then you get Ryze 2.0: busted in pro play, useless in soloq.

Sad but true.
Riot : SEJUANI SPOTTED. PREPARE TO DROP THE NERF HAMMER!
Then she'll go back to being broken in pro play,and she'll eventually be shen and galio'd.
